function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in CO2 concentration depending on sensor location","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of CO2 levels could lead to false assessments of indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Regular calibration of sensors and cross-validation with multiple sensors in different locations","Technologies":"Smart IEQ sensor nodes with self-calibration features, data fusion algorithms for cross-validation","People":"Occupants of the building, facility managers, health and safety teams","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation during door and window opening","Impact":"Inadequate ventilation could lead to poor air quality and potential buildup of CO2 and other contaminants","Mitigation":"Implement automated ventilation systems, use real-time monitoring data to determine optimal ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, occupancy sensors, real-time monitoring and control systems","People":"Occupants of the building, facility managers, health and safety teams","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety teams"},{"Description":"IEQ monitoring system testing without considering infectious disease transmission","Impact":"Failure to consider the impact of infectious disease transmission on IEQ monitoring could lead to inadequate mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Incorporate infectious disease transmission data and guidelines into IEQ monitoring and mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Infectious disease transmission models, real-time monitoring of occupancy levels, ventilation control based on disease transmission risk","People":"Occupants of the building, health and safety teams, infectious disease experts","Owner":"Facility management, health and safety teams"}]}
